ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of EDWARD EARL ARONOFF of Montréal, Quebec, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective November 23, 2009.
